verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:15
verses.text: But my mercy shall not depart away from him, as I took it from Saul, whom I put away before thee.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:16
verses.text: And thine house and thy kingdom shall be established for ever before thee: thy throne shall be established for ever.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:17
verses.text: According to all these words, and according to all this vision, so did Nathan speak unto David.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:18
verses.text: Then went king David in, and sat before the Lord, and he said, Who am I, O Lord God? and what is my house, that thou hast brought me hitherto?
